title: The vanity of the creature by the author of The whole duty of man, &c. ; together with a letter prefix'd, sent to the bookseller, relating to the author.
author: Allestree, Richard, 1619-1681.
notes: "'The whole duty of man' formerly attributed to Lady Pakington or to Richard Sterne, but more probably written by Richard Allestree"--BM.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
